Description: That had to hurt... but the target seems unphased.
That had to hurt... but you only see the slightest scratch/scorch/bruise.
That had to hurt... but the target ignores the damage completely.
So close!
Missed it by that much...
Not even close. The target doesn't care.
Not even close. The target is aggravated.
Not even close. The target is not amused.
Not even close. The target is amused
The target saw it coming and feinted to throw off your aim.
The target seems to have trained against your fighting style. They were ready this time.
Roll a save DC 5. On a fail, the target disarms you.
Roll a save DC 8. On a fail, the target disarms you.
Roll a save DC 12. On a fail, the target disarms you.
Roll a save DC 16. On a fail, the target disarms you.
Roll a save DC 20. On a fail, the target disarms you.
Roll a save DC 12. On a fail, the target takes your weapon.
Roll a save DC 16. On a fail, the target takes your weapon.
Roll a save DC 20. On a fail, the target takes your weapon.
Your footing gives way and throws off your attack.
Your footing gives way and throws off your attack. Roll a save DC 8 or fall prone.
Your footing gives way and throws off your attack. Roll a save DC 12 or fall prone.
Your footing gives way and throws off your attack. Roll a save DC 16 or fall prone.
Your footing gives way and throws off your attack. Roll a save DC 20 or fall prone.
Your weapon strikes a nearby object. Roll a Strength check DC 10 to free your weapon with a bonus action.
Your weapon strikes a nearby object. Roll a Strength check DC 16 to free your weapon with a bonus action.
Your weapon strikes a nearby object. Roll a Strength check DC 20 to free your weapon with a bonus action.
Your weapon is slick or Your weapon balance was off.
Your weapon is slick or your weapon balance was off. Roll a save DC 12 or launch your weapon DC 12 feet away from yourself in a random direction.
The target catches your weapon arm. Roll a contested check or become disarmed.
The target catches your weapon arm. Roll a contested check or become disarmed.
The target catches your weapon arm. Roll a contested check or become disarmed.
The target catches your weapon arm. Roll a contested check or become grappled.
The target catches your weapon arm. Roll a contested check or become grappled.
The target catches your weapon arm. Roll a contested check or become grappled.
The target catches your weapon arm. Roll a contested check or become disarmed and grappled.
The target catches your weapon arm. Roll a contested check or become disarmed and grappled.
The target catches your weapon arm. Roll a contested check or become disarmed and grappled.
The target catches your weapon arm. Roll a contested check or become disarmed, grappled, and prone.
The target stirs some memory. Roll a WIS save DC 10 + 1 per page of the character's backstory or become charmed/frightened until the end of your next turn.
The target really looks tough. Roll a CON save DC 10 + 2 for every hit dice higher than you the target has (-2 for every hit dice less). On a fail, become frightened until the end of your next turn.
The target looks really confident. Roll an INT save DC 10 + target's INT modifier. On a fail, become frightened until the end of your next turn.
The target throws dust in your face. Roll a CON save DC 10 or become blinded until the end of your next turn.
The target throws dust in your face. Roll a CON save DC 12 or become blinded until the end of your next turn.
The target throws dust in your face. Roll a CON save DC 16 or become blinded until the end of your next turn.
The target throws dust in your face. Roll a CON save DC 20 or become blinded until the end of your next turn.
The target feints and makes a blunt strike. Roll a CON save DC 10 or become stunned until the end of your next turn.
The target feints and makes a blunt strike. Roll a CON save DC 16 or become stunned until the end of your next turn.
The target feints and makes a blunt strike. Roll a CON save DC 20 or become stunned until the end of your next turn.
Your strike is deflected, but your power is not diffused. You deal half your weapon damage without modifiers against a random space near you.
Comment: To determine a random space, roll a D8 on square maps and a D6 on hex maps. Count the spaces clockwise around the attacker. Choose the target nearest to the character within range of reach and in the direction the dice dictate.

Description: Your strike is deflected, but your power is not diffused. You deal half your weapon damage without modifiers against a random space near you.
Comment: To determine a random space, roll a D8 on square maps and a D6 on hex maps. Count the spaces clockwise around the attacker. Choose the target nearest to the character within range of reach and in the direction the dice dictate.

Description: Your strike is deflected, but your power is not diffused. You deal half your weapon damage without modifiers against a random space near you.
Comment: To determine a random space, roll a D8 on square maps and a D6 on hex maps. Count the spaces clockwise around the attacker. Choose the target nearest to the character within range of reach and in the direction the dice dictate.

Description: Your strike is deflected, but your power is not diffused. You deal 3/4 weapon damage without modifiers against a random space near you.
Comment: To determine a random space, roll a D8 on square maps and a D6 on hex maps. Count the spaces clockwise around the attacker. Choose the target nearest to the character within range of reach and in the direction the dice dictate.

Comment: To determine a random space, roll a D8 on square maps and a D6 on hex maps. Count the spaces clockwise around the attacker. Choose the target nearest to the character within range of reach and in the direction the dice dictate.

Comment: To determine a random space, roll a D8 on square maps and a D6 on hex maps. Count the spaces clockwise around the attacker. Choose the target nearest to the character within range of reach and in the direction the dice dictate.

Description: Your strike is deflected, but your power is not diffused. You deal full weapon damage without modifiers against a random space near you.
Comment: To determine a random space, roll a D8 on square maps and a D6 on hex maps. Count the spaces clockwise around the attacker. Choose the target nearest to the character within range of reach and in the direction the dice dictate.

Comment: To determine a random space, roll a D8 on square maps and a D6 on hex maps. Count the spaces clockwise around the attacker. Choose the target nearest to the character within range of reach and in the direction the dice dictate.

Comment: To determine a random space, roll a D8 on square maps and a D6 on hex maps. Count the spaces clockwise around the attacker. Choose the target nearest to the character within range of reach and in the direction the dice dictate.

Description: Your strike is deflected, but your power is not diffused. You deal half weapon damage after modifiers against a random space near you.
Comment: To determine a random space, roll a D8 on square maps and a D6 on hex maps. Count the spaces clockwise around the attacker. Choose the target nearest to the character within range of reach and in the direction the dice dictate.

Description: The target parries wickedly. Gain disadvantage on all attacks with your current weapon until it is repaired.
The target parries wickedly. Gain disadvantage on all attacks with your current weapon until it is repaired.
The target parries wickedly. Gain disadvantage on all attacks with your current weapon until it is repaired.
The target tears at your armor. Roll a Strength save DC 10 or lose 1d4 AC until your armor is repaired.
Comment: If your AC would be reduced to less than 10 + Dex + Shield, reduce your speed by 5 feet per point instead.

Description: The target tears at your armor. Roll a Strength save DC 16 or lose 1d4 AC until your armor is repaired.
Comment: If your AC would be reduced to less than 10 + Dex + Shield, reduce your speed by 5 feet per point instead.

Description: The target tears at your armor. Roll a Strength save DC 20 or lose 1d4 AC until your armor is repaired.
Comment: If your AC would be reduced to less than 10 + Dex + Shield, reduce your speed by 5 feet per point instead.

Description: The target intentionally bashes your shield. Roll a Strength save DC 10 or remove the armor bonus from your shield until it is repaired.
The target intentionally bashes your shield. Roll a Strength save DC 16 or remove the armor bonus from your shield until it is repaired.
The target intentionally bashes your shield. Roll a Strength save DC 20 or remove the armor bonus from your shield until it is repaired.
The target catches your weapon and stomps on it. The target makes a Strength check DC 10+1 per pound of weapon weight to break the weapon.
Comment: If the weapon is magic, it doesn't break, but the weapon loses all magic properties for 1d4 days.

Description: The target disengages and may move up to 10 feet in any direction as a reaction.
Roll a contested STR check with your target. On a fail, the target moves you 5 feet in a random direction.
Roll a contested STR check with your target. On a fail, the target moves you 10 feet in a random direction.
Roll a contested STR check with your target. On a fail, the target moves you 15 feet in a random direction; on a save, the target moves you only 5 feet.
Roll a contested STR check with your target. On a fail, the target moves you 5 feet in a direction advantageous to its allies.
Roll a contested STR check with your target. On a fail, the target moves you up to 10 feet in a direction advantageous to its allies.
Roll a contested STR check with your target. On a fail, the target moves you up to 15 feet in a direction advantageous to its allies; on a save, the target moves you only 5 feet.
Roll a contested STR check with your target. On a fail, the target moves you up to 5 feet in a direction advantageous to its allies. Roll a Dex save DC10. On a fail, you fall prone.
Roll a contested STR check with your target. On a fail, the target moves you up to 10 feet in a direction advantageous to its allies. Roll a Dex save DC15. On a fail, you fall prone.

Roll a contested STR check with your target. On a fail, the target moves you up to 15 feet in a direction advantageous to its allies; on a save, the target moves you only 5 feet. Roll a Dex save DC20. On a fail, you fall prone.
Roll a contested STR check with your target. On a fail, the target disarms you.
Roll a contested STR check with your target. On a fail, the target grapples you.
Roll a contested STR check with your target. On a fail, the target puts you in a hold, you become restrained.
The target grabs a random item which is not your armor, shield, or equipped weapon. The target is in possession of that item.
Roll a DEX save DC 20. On a fail, the target trips you as a reaction. You fall prone.
Roll a CON save DC 20. On a fail, the target punches your ear. You become incapacitated.
Roll a CON save DC 20. On a fail, the target punches you in the eyes. You become blinded for 1d4 rounds.
The target takes the opportunity to shout loudly for help. Add 1d4 targets to combat.
Comment: The total CR of four of these creatures should not equal more than the lowest member of the party could handle. They may arrive in up to 1d6 rounds.

Description: The target takes the opportunity to shout loudly for help. Add 1d4 targets to combat.
Comment: The total CR of four of these creatures should not equal more than the lowest member of the party could handle. They may arrive in up to 1d6 rounds.

Description: The target takes the opportunity to shout loudly for help. Add 1d4 targets to combat.
Comment: The total CR of four of these creatures should not equal more than the lowest member of the party could handle. They may arrive in up to 1d6 rounds.

Description: The enemy gets an attack as a reaction. The attack automatically deals 1d8 damage, plus a strength modifer. Roll a CON save DC 10+target's STR modifier. On a fail, you become incapacitated until the end of your next turn. Roll a CON save DC 10+target's STR modifier. On a fail, you become incapacitated until the end of your next turn.
The enemy gets an attack as a reaction. The attack automatically deals 1d8 damage, plus a strength modifer. Roll a DEX save DC 10+target's STR modifier. On a fail, you fall prone.

The enemy gets an attack as a reaction. The attack automatically deals 1d8 damage, plus a strength modifer. Roll a CON save DC 10+target's STR modifier. On a fail, you become stunned until the end of your next turn.

The enemy gets an attack as a reaction. The attack automatically deals 1d8 damage, and an additional 1d4 damage for each 3 levels you have, plus a strength modifer. Roll a CON save DC 10+target's STR modifier. On a fail, you become blinded until the end of your next turn.

The enemy gets an attack with advantage as a reaction. If it hits, deals 1d8 damage, and an additional 1d4 damage for each 3 levels you have, plus a strength modifer. Roll a CON save DC 10+target's STR modifier. On a fail, you become deafened until the end of your next turn.

The enemy gets an attack with advantage. If it hits, roll a CON Save DC20. On a fail: You feel no pain. Then you realize you're in shock. You see your own eyeball laying on the floor. You have disadvantage to sight-based checks for 1d20 days. You have disadvantage on all attacks for 1d4 days.

The enemy gets an attack with advantage as a reaction with a secret weapon. The attack automatically hits and deals 1d4 damage, plus a strength modifer. Roll a CON save DC 10+target's INT modifier. On a fail, you become poisoned for 1 round + 1 round for every 2 CR of the target.
The enemy gets an attack with advantage as a reaction. If it hits, the attack deals 2d6 damage, and an additional 1d6 for each 3 levels you have, plus a strength modifer.

The enemy attacks with advantage as a reaction. If it hits, roll a CON save DC 20. On a fail: You feel no pain. Then you realize you're in shock. The enemy has removed your lower leg. You've always wondered what it would be like to lose a leg. I guess now you'll find out. Your movement speed is permanently reduced by 15 feet. A prosthetic leg would restore 10 feet of speed.

The enemy attacks with advantage as a reaction. If it hits, roll a CON save DC 20. On a fail: You feel no pain. Then you realize you're in shock. The enemy has removed your hand. Maybe a blacksmith could forge a prosthetic grip. At least you'll be memorable.
It happens to the best of us, we have a bad day. You leave yourself vulnerable for just a moment. The target deals non-lethal bludgeoning damage equal to 5 + temporary HP + your remaining HP.
